name: DVD Video Screensaver Simulator
description:
It's Saturday night. You're at a friend's house for a sleepover. You fell asleep while you and your buddies were watching one of your favorite movies. It's the middle of the night. You wake up to the sensation of having to pee. In the corner, a bright light emerges from the TV. It's the bouncing logo thing. 

This simulator allows you to relive those precious moments of your childhood. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the tranquility of the DVD Video logo bouncing off the edges of your screen.  Anticipate the moment that one day, it will hit the edges. Ah, the good ol' days.

Press ENTER for fullscreen, and press SHIFT to show the number of edge bounces.
